title: Joel Osteen: The Two Powerful Words That Can Change Your Life
description: Learn how to manifest the life you want with two simple words. Pastor Joel Osteen, one of America’s most influential religious leaders, discusses personal success, the power behind the words we speak and how each of us can make a difference. Oprah says Pastor Osteen changed the way she speaks power into her life.
author: podcasts@own.oprah.com (Oprah)
